## Mari0: A Combination of Two Classic Games

Mari0 is a video game that combines the classic Super Mario Bros. and Portal games. The game was created by Maurice Guégan, using the LÖVE game engine. The game is available for Windows, Mac, and Linux.

Mari0 takes the classic side-scrolling Mario gameplay and adds the ability to shoot portals, just like the Portal games. The player can swap between the Super Mario Bros. and Portal gamemodes at any point in the game. In addition, Mari0 has new features such as a level editor, support for multiplayer, and a co-op campaign. 

### Gameplay

The basic gameplay in Mari0 is similar to the original Super Mario Bros. game. Players control Mario and run, jump, and shoot enemies through various levels. The levels in Mari0 are similar to the levels in Super Mario Bros., but there are also new levels created by players using the level editor.

The portal gameplay in Mari0 adds a new dimension to the game. Players can shoot portals on walls, floors, and ceilings to create shortcuts, solve puzzles, and eliminate enemies. The puzzles in Mari0 are challenging and require players to use their problem-solving skills.

### Multiplayer

Mari0 supports both co-op and competitive multiplayer modes. Players can connect over a local network or online to play together. The co-op mode allows players to work together to complete levels, while the competitive mode pits players against each other in races to the finish.

### Level Editor

Mari0 includes a level editor that lets players create their own levels. The editor is easy to use and allows players to create levels that are just as challenging as those in the game. Players can share their levels online and download levels created by other players.

### Graphics and Sound

Mari0 retains the classic graphics and sound effects of Super Mario Bros. while also incorporating the portal gameplay. The game also includes a new soundtrack that adds to the overall experience.

### Conclusion

Mari0 is an exciting multi-player game that will keep you on your toes. Its combination of Super Mario Bros. and Portal gameplay is a refreshing and unique experience that is sure to delight fans of both franchises. With its level editor, multi-player support, and challenging puzzles, Mari0 is a game that will keep you coming back for more.
